alert.note: Alert for George; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:59PM CDT until June 10 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern George County in southeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of McHenry, or 13 miles southeast of Wiggins, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern George and southeastern Stone Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
